Parts.A: This quest step is Tony at The Sinkhole, at "TeleportPlayer 18532.507813 138012.78125 -8466.032227"
I have nothing for you right now.
Hello, I am sorry but I cannot help you right.
About bloody time. Stupid cannibals were getting impatient.
Parts.B: Huh.. good thing I'm here then.

Parts.A: Gods! That's not what I need. Try again.
It sure is. Thanks {{char.name}}. Take this for your help. Can you transport some stuff for me?
Parts.B: Yeah okay, I can do that

Parts.A: I need you to take these scrolls up to the Siblings Castle up north. Big black castle on an island surrounded by water. Go in and up the stairs. Up there you will find the Archives. I need you to give the scrolls to the Master Archivist.
Take the **sealed scroll** to the Master Archivist at the Siblings' Castle.
